Package tk.airshipcraft.commonlib.gui.objects

Class Sidebar

java.lang.Object
tk.airshipcraft.commonlib.gui.objects.Sidebar
public class Sidebar extends Object
This class represents a sidebar scoreboard in Minecraft, which is displayed on the side of the player's screen. It allows for the creation of custom scoreboard objectives and scores that can be displayed to players. Additionally, this class provides methods to add, remove, and manipulate scores and text on the sidebar.
Since:
2023-04-11
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Locutusque, notzune

  • Constructor Details

    • Sidebar

      public Sidebar(String title)
      Initializes a new Sidebar instance with a specific title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title displayed at the top of the sidebar.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(String text, int score)
      Adds a text line with a specific score to the sidebar. If the text already exists, it will update its score.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to add as a line on the sidebar.
      score - The score used to order the text on the sidebar.

    • add

      public void add(String text)
      Adds a text line to the sidebar with the next available score.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to add as a line on the sidebar.

    • remove

      public void remove(String text)
      Removes a specific line of text from the sidebar.
      Parameters:
      text - The text line to remove from the sidebar.

    • setLine

      public void setLine(String text, int score)
      Sets the score for an existing line of text. If the text does not exist, it is added.
      Parameters:
      text - The line of text to update the score for.
      score - The new score for the text line.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all text lines from the sidebar.

    • applyStyle

      public void applyStyle(org.bukkit.ChatColor color, org.bukkit.ChatColor style)
      Applies a color and style to the sidebar title and text lines.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to apply to the sidebar text.
      style - The style to apply to the sidebar text.

    • show

      public void show(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Displays the sidebar to a specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to display the sidebar to.

    • hide

      public void hide(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Hides the sidebar from a specified player, reverting them to the main scoreboard.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to hide the sidebar from.

    • getTextFromLine

      public String getTextFromLine(int line)
      Retrieves the text from a specific line on the sidebar.
      Parameters:
      line - The line number to retrieve text from.
      Returns:
      The text of the specified line, or null if no text is set at that line.

    • isLineEmpty

      public boolean isLineEmpty(int line)
      Checks whether a specific line on the sidebar has text set.
      Parameters:
      line - The line number to check.
      Returns:
      true if the line has no text set, false otherwise.

    • renameLine

      public void renameLine(String oldText, String newText)
      Renames a line if it exists or adds it if it does not.
      Parameters:
      oldText - The existing text to find and rename.
      newText - The new text to replace the old text.

    • incrementScore

      public void incrementScore(String text, int amount)
      Increments the score of a given line by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      text - The line of text whose score to increment.
      amount - The amount to increment the score by.

    • decrementScore

      public void decrementScore(String text, int amount)
      Decrements the score of a given line by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      text - The line of text whose score to decrement.
      amount - The amount to decrement the score by.

    • updateDisplayName

      public void updateDisplayName(String name)
      Updates the display name of the sidebar.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name to set for the sidebar.

    • getScoreboard

      public org.bukkit.scoreboard.Scoreboard getScoreboard()
      Gets the Scoreboard object this sidebar is based on.
      Returns:
      The Scoreboard object.
